verses.name: 1 John 3:22
verses.text: And whatsoever we ask, we receive of him, because we keep his commandments, and do those things that are pleasing in his sight.

verses.name: 1 John 3:23
verses.text: And this is his commandment, That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ, and love one another, as he gave us commandment.

verses.name: 1 John 3:24
verses.text: And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him, and he in him. And hereby we know that he abideth in us, by the Spirit which he hath given us.
